title: Bitcoin Heist: Family Members Waterboarded, Sexually Assaulted as Attackers Steal $1.6 Million
contentSnippet: Horrific details of a Bitcoin wrench attack in Canada were revealed, with victims held hostage, waterboarded, and sexually assaulted.

title: SEC Clears Fuse Energy Token in Win for US Crypto ‘Regulatory Clarity’

title: Trump Signs 'Genesis Mission' Executive Order to Use AI to Supercharge US Innovation
contentSnippet: Trump's latest order aims to fuse federal data, supercomputing, and AI to speed discoveries across energy, biology, and national security.

title: Irreverent memecoin inspired by World Liberty founder rallies 130% after Trump-connected crypto project’s endorsement
contentSnippet: World Liberty, the crypto project linked to President Donald Trump’s family, said it would invest in the SPSC memecoin.

title: Fuse Crypto receives SEC no-action relief letter over its green energy rewards token

title: Bitcoin Giant Strategy Skips Bitcoin Buy With Stock Down 67% From Peak
contentSnippet: The Bitcoin-buying firm has a habit of announcing purchases on Monday.

title: XRP, SUI Lead Crypto Rebound as Bitcoin Tops $89K; Relief Rally Faces $100K Wall, Trader Says

title: Stablecoins Could 'Pose Stability Risks,' ECB Says in Latest Warning

title: Monad token climbs 46% after early dip as Coinbase-sale buyers receive allocations

title: Crypto turbulence drives demand for CME’s regulated products, setting new volume records
contentSnippet: "Amid ongoing market uncertainty, demand for deeply liquid, regulated crypto risk management tools is accelerating," CME Group said.

title: 'Assassin's Creed' Maker Ubisoft Unveils Game Powered by Generative AI
contentSnippet: Ubisoft’s experimental Teammates game demo is built around player voice commands with improvised dialogue generated by AI.

title: TON Rallies 8% as Telegram Ecosystem Expands With AI Launch, Tokenized Stocks
contentSnippet: Recent developments include the launch of Confidential Compute Open Network (COCOON) and the integration of tokenized US stocks and digital collectibles.

title: The Daily: JPMorgan Chase closes Strike CEO’s accounts, Monad launches mainnet, Grayscale debuts DOGE and XRP ETFs, plus more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: Monad's $105 Million Airdrop Underwhelms Speculators as Token Debuts Near Sale Price
contentSnippet: Monad completed its long-awaited airdrop of MON tokens on Monday, giving recipients over $100 million worth of cryptocurrency.

title: As 2026 midterms near, Stand With Crypto zeroes in on state and federal races with new candidate survey
contentSnippet: The crypto advocacy group Stand With Crypto has begun surveying political candidates as the 2026 midterms draw closer.

title: ‘100% track record of coming back’: IBIT short interest sinks toward April lows as bitcoin bears unwind positions
contentSnippet: Bitcoin ETF outflows are still heavy, but analysts say long-term holders are quietly accumulating while traders reset positions.

title: CME Crypto Futures Volume Hits Record 795K Contracts Amid Volatility

title: BNB Rebounds Above $860 After Testing Key Support
contentSnippet: The recovery lifted BNB above multiple resistance zones, but the relatively low volume behind the move may limit follow-through as traders watch the $870 level.

title: 5 Reasons Why Bitcoin Crashed—And Why It Could Fall Further: Deutsche Bank
contentSnippet: Bitcoin crashed from $126K to $82K—Deutsche Bank explains the five factors behind the plunge and uncertain recovery ahead.

title: Celestia’s TIA Token Rises as ‘Matcha’ Upgrade Preps Network for Cross-Chain Future
contentSnippet: The event is being called its biggest software upgrade yet, which boosts the network’s capacity and improves token economics.

title: Why Analysts Are Split on Bitcoin Miner MARA's Prospects
contentSnippet: Shares of top miner and Bitcoin treasury MARA dropped last week—with other BTC miners. Analysts are divided over what's next for the firm's stock price.

title: Brevan Howard offered $25 million ‘refund right’ for its Berachain investment: Unchained

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.

title: NFT markets rebound after $1.2B wipeout in Friday’s crypto crash

title: Sorare CEO still bullish on Ethereum despite ‘upgrading’ to Solana
contentSnippet: Fantasy sports crypto platform Sorare is migrating from Ethereum to Solana, with its CEO saying it is a better fit for Sorare due to its scalability and focus on consumer applications.
